item.description:
For those who want to carpool, meet at  9:00 AM in the Exeter Stop and Shop parking lot far corner (Portsmouth Ave and Holland Way). The other car pool meeting place will be at the Newburyport park and ride (C&J bus stop) at 9:25 AM.

This shoot will be in the area of the House Of Seven Gables which is in the waterfront area of Salem.  We can use the House of the Seven Gables parking lot. Here are the driving directions from I-95.

There are lot of photo opportunities including historic buildings over 200 hundred years old as well the Custom House, museums, a tall ship, The Bunghole, etc.

You can optionally have lunch at the Nathaniel Hawthorne Hotel in the Tavern around 12:30.

 

A prize will given to someone whose photo entry is picked that represents the Spirit and Uniqueness of ole Salem. No photo editing is allowed except for cropping. Converting to B/W is OK too. The winner will be announced at the next meeting.
item.how_to_find_us: Carpool from Stratham or Newburyport, or meet at the House of Seven Gables parking lot.
item.name: Day Trip to Salem, MA
